00044                 public void readMedium(Media tmp)
00045                 {
00046                         try
00047                         {
00048                                 media = tmp;
00049                                 pictureBox1.Image = null;
00050                                 textBox1.Text = media.TrackNr.ToString();
00051                                 textBox2.Text = media.Title;
00052                                 textBox3.Text = media.Album;
00053                                 textBox4.Text = media.Artist;
00054                                 textBox5.Text = media.Year.ToString();
00055                                 textBox6.Text = media.Genre;
00056                                 textBox7.Text = media.Comment;
00057                                 textBox8.Text = media.Composer;
00058                                 textBox9.Text = media.Copyright;
00059                                 if (media.Cover != null)
00060                                         pictureBox1.Image = Image.FromStream(media.Cover);
00061                         }
00062                         catch (IOException ex)
00063                         {
00064                                 throw ex;
00065                         }
00066                 }

00068                 private void save_button_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00069                 {
00070                         Stream fs;
00071 
00072                         //Media media = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00073                         media.TrackNr = UInt32.Parse(textBox1.Text);
00074                         media.Title = textBox2.Text;
00075                         media.Album = textBox3.Text;
00076                         media.Artist = textBox4.Text;
00077                         media.Year = UInt32.Parse(textBox5.Text);
00078                         media.Genre = textBox6.Text;
00079                         media.Comment = textBox7.Text;
00080                         media.Composer = textBox8.Text;
00081                         media.Copyright = textBox9.Text;
00082 
00083                         if (pictureBox1.Image != null)
00084                         {
00085                                 if (openFileDialog2.FileName != "")
00086                                 {
00087                                         fs = new FileStream(openFileDialog2.FileName, FileMode.Open);
00088                                         media.Cover = fs;
00089                                 }
00090                                 else
00091                                 {
00092                                         fs = new MemoryStream();
00093                                         pictureBox1.Image.Save(fs, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);
00094                                         media.Cover = fs;
00095                                 }
00096                         }
00097                         
00098                         media.commitToTag();
00099 
00100 
00101                         // Flag wird gesetzt das File geändert wurde, somit ein playlist refresh ausgelöst
00102                         Playlist.Instance.id3tag_edited = true;
00103                         Close();
00104                 }

00106                 private void openpic_button_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00107                 {
00108                         Stream myStream = null;
00109 
00110                         openFileDialog2.Filter = "Bilddateien (*.jpg; *.png)|*.jpg;*.png";
00111                         if (openFileDialog2.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
00112                         {
00113                                 try
00114                                 {
00115                                         if ((myStream = openFileDialog2.OpenFile()) != null)
00116                                         {
00117 
00118                                                 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(myStream);
00119                                                 pictureBox1.SizeMode = PictureBoxSizeMode.StretchImage;
00120                                                 pictureBox1.Image = bmp;
00121                                                 pictureBox1.Refresh();
00122                                                 myStream.Close();
00123                                         }
00124                                 }
00125                                 catch (IOException ex)
00126                                 {
00127                                         MessageBox.Show("Error: Could not read file from disk. Original error: " + ex.Message,"IOException",MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00128                                 }
00129                         }
00130                 }

00132                 private Bitmap ResizeBitmap(Bitmap b, int nWidth, int nHeight)
00133                 {
00134                         Bitmap result = new Bitmap(nWidth, nHeight);
00135                         using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage((Image)result))
00136                                 g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0, nWidth, nHeight);
00137                         return result;
00138                 }

00156                 private void SuggestButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00157                 {
00158                         progressBar1.Visible = true;
00159                         progressBar1.Value = 0;
00160                         progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value+1)%100;
00161                         string interpret = textBox4.Text;
00162                         string titel = textBox2.Text;
00163                         string album = textBox3.Text;
00164             progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00165                         musicbrainz musicbrain = new musicbrainz();
00166             progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00167                         musicbrainz.InterpretInfo[] Interpreten = new musicbrainz.InterpretInfo[25];
00168                         musicbrainz.CDInfo[] CDInfos = new musicbrainz.CDInfo[25];
00169             progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00170                         try
00171                         {
00172                                 Interpreten = musicbrain.get_Interpret(interpret);
00173                         }
00174                         catch (WebException)
00175                         {
00176                                 MessageBox.Show("Remoteserver access failed!\nPlease check the Interpret and the network connection.", "Suggest-Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00177                         }
00178                         System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00179             progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00180                         if (Interpreten[0].score >= 99)
00181                         {
00182                                 bool album_query = false;
00183                                 if (album == null || album == "")
00184                                 {
00185                     progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00186                                         try
00187                                         {
00188                                                 CDInfos = musicbrain.get_CDs(interpret, titel);
00189                                         }
00190                                         catch(WebException){
00191                                                 MessageBox.Show("Remoteserver access failed!\nPlease check the Interpret, Titel and the network connection.", "Suggest-Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00192                                         }
00193                     progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00194                                 }
00195                                 else
00196                                 {
00197                     progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00198                                         try
00199                                         {
00200                                         CDInfos = musicbrain.get_CDs_from_Album(interpret, album);
00201                                 }
00202                                 catch (WebException)
00203                                 {
00204                                         MessageBox.Show("Remoteserver access failed!\nPlease check the Interpret, Album and the network connection.", "Suggest-Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00205                                 }
00206                                         album_query = true;
00207                     progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00208                                 }
00209 
00210                                 for (int n = 0; n <= 24; n++)
00211                                 {
00212                                         progressBar1.Value++;
00213                                         if (CDInfos[n].cdASIN != null)
00214                                         {
00215                         progressBar1.Value = (progressBar1.Value + 1) % 100;
00216                                                 show_CDImage(CDInfos[n].coverURL);
00217                                                 if (!album_query)
00218                                                         textBox3.Text = CDInfos[n].cdName;
00219                                                 break;
00220                                         }
00221                                 }
00222                         }
00223             progressBar1.Visible = false;
00224             
00225                 }
00226                 public void show_CDImage(string img_url)
00227                 {
00228                         string strImageUrl = img_url;
00229                         try
00230                         {
00231                                 WebRequest wrq = WebRequest.Create(strImageUrl);
00232                                 WebResponse wrp = wrq.GetResponse();
00233 
00234                                 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(wrp.GetResponseStream());
00235                                 pictureBox1.SizeMode = PictureBoxSizeMode.StretchImage;
00236                                 pictureBox1.Image = bmp;
00237                                 pictureBox1.Refresh();
00238                                 pictureBox1.Update();
00239                         }
00240                         catch
00241                         {
00242                                 pictureBox1.Image = null;
00243                                 pictureBox1.Update();
00244                         }
00245                 }               
00246         }
